title: Riot, Can Illaoi have a new skin?
body: So Illaoi has been out since Pre-Season 6 and she still only has her Release skin, I think as an Illaoi player she needs a new skin. hope you agree.

replies.body: b*tch, get on the line {{champion:69}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:112}}

All those already have a pool of skins to choose from. While there hasn't been one released in a while, Illaoi only has one option: Her void skin.

A temporary solution could also be a chroma pack. 

The exception to that list is Yorick :( (due to only having 2 skins that are sub-1350 RP)

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=cKAVYOzG,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-06T22:08:57.662+0000)
>
> b*tch, get on the line {{champion:69}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:112}}

B*tch they got more than 1 skin atleast

I dont even play illaoi much and I agree she needs a skin, she came out in 2015

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gKce96nhHVY
GP has a new skin coming, and his recall animation has a tentacle.
Coincidence?
I've said it twice now: Targonian aspect illaoi. celestial theme, give her aurelion-esque tentacles, bam. that's a 975-1350 skin right there.
I would love a Targonian Aspect Illaoi, as a Illaoi/Aurelion Sol player i would buy that skin without a doubt.
Yeah. It just seemed obvious as a skin concept to me.

> [{quoted}](name=midnight oil24,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=cKAVYOzG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-06T21:54:39.540+0000)
>
> I've said it twice now: Targonian aspect illaoi. celestial theme, give her aurelion-esque tentacles, bam. that's a 975-1350 skin right there.

Naw. She needs a skin to match GP's latest one on the PBE.

GP nearly shoots a squishy alien baby before the porthole opens up and an alien tentacle drags him out into space.

Of course, that's his recall and you see him drop into base with the tentacle on the ground, severed.
Illaoion Sol Confirmed

> [{quoted}](name=midnight oil24,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=cKAVYOzG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-06T21:54:39.540+0000)
>
> I've said it twice now: Targonian aspect illaoi. celestial theme, give her aurelion-esque tentacles, bam. that's a 975-1350 skin right there.

That would be sooo cool!
IKR? I'd buy her and the skin in a heartbeat.

Overall I find it surprising that she didn't get a Dreadnova skin as well.

I mean it is really rare nowadays for riot to release a standalone skin thats not a release skin for a champion or an ultimate skin and alien tentacles would have been a pretty neat idea for an illaoi skin.
Jhiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiin

>
> Jhiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiin

Jhin gets played constantly, fuck him. Quinn could do with a new one.
Quinn is getting a new one.
Which to ritos standards should mean he should get another skin. Quinn has like what six already? Including the Heart seeker?
Final Boss Illaoi?
Dunkmaster Illaoi. The skin practically makes itself.

Im curious which they would do since she has so many good opprotunities.  Car salesman, Dunk Mistress, Soulstealer, Battlecast, Elderwood, Arclight, Final Boss, etc.  The new GP skin shows she could even get a scifi alien one.
I need a Dragon Sorceress Illaoi.
Yeah i totally are its about time she gets a really dope skin no rushed shit a reallly good quality skin{{champion:420}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Dunk master Illaoi would be amazing. Instead of tentacles she could have goal posts, foam finger, etc... Her W and R are perfect dunk moves imho.
H E N T A I L L A O I
Dunk master
Another idea I just had, was a Christmas Illaoi, The Tentacles could be Icicles. IDK just an idea.
FYI this is my first post, so I most likely made a lot of mistakes :D
Nah you're fine^^  I too agree she is long overdo for a skin; Riot is aware of it.
